Chengsi's Blog

Some people have always been eager to change the world. But I'll just settle for understanding it first.

Hi, I am Chengsi ZHOU (周成思). Welcome to visit my personal website. I am a Phd student in INSA Lyon. I am working on Computational Fluid Dynamics. My Phd thesis is about two-phase flow in singularity.

The life is simple. Here, my blogs record my life. Where did I go? What did I think? How do I know about the world?
